function.name: setForces
function.description: Set the number and/or owner of forces on a planet. Used to modify military units on a specific hex coordinate.

coordinates.description: Hex coordinates in format 'q,r' (e.g., '0,1', '-1,2'). The location of the planet to modify.

amount.description: New amount of forces to set on the planet. Must be 0 or greater. Use -1 to keep existing amount.

player.description: Game player ID of the new owner. Use -1 to keep existing owner or assign to current user if no owner.

function.name: grantTech
function.description: Grant a technology to a player. Adds a new tech to the player's collection.

techId.description: Unique identifier of the technology to grant (e.g., 'freeze_dried_forces', 'megaLaser')

player.description: Game player ID to grant the tech to. Use -1 for current user.

function.name: removeTech
function.description: Remove a technology from a player. Removes the tech from the player's collection.

techId.description: Unique identifier of the technology to remove

player.description: Game player ID to remove the tech from. Use -1 for current user.

function.name: setTechExhausted
function.description: Set the exhausted state of a player's technology. Exhausted techs cannot be used until refreshed.

player.description: Game player ID who owns the tech. Use -1 for current user.

exhausted.description: Whether the tech should be exhausted (true) or unexhausted (false)

function.name: setPlanetExhausted
function.description: Set the exhausted state of a planet. Exhausted planets cannot produce until refreshed.

coordinates.description: Hex coordinates in format 'q,r' of the planet to modify

exhausted.description: Whether the planet should be exhausted (true) or unexhausted (false)

function.name: setPlayerTurn
function.description: Set which player's turn it currently is. Changes the active player.

player.description: Game player ID whose turn it should be. Use -1 for current user.

function.name: setPlayerScience
function.description: Set a player's science total. Science is used to purchase technologies.

science.description: New science total for the player. Must be 0 or greater.

player.description: Game player ID to modify. Use -1 for current user.

function.name: setPlayerVictoryPoints
function.description: Set a player's Victory Points total. Victory Points are used to win the game.

vp.description: New Victory Points total for the player. Must be 0 or greater.

player.description: Game player ID to modify. Use -1 for current user.
